name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Golang Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **GoLang**, with a strong background in **AWS**, **Docker**, **microservices**, and orchestration using **AWS SQS** and **Kafka**. Skilled in utilizing **CI/CD** tools such as **Jenkins** and version control with **Git**. Demonstrated expertise in both NoSQL and SQL databases, ensuring efficient data management and retrieval.
Additionally, experienced in backend development using **Python**, and implementing infrastructure as code (IaaC) strategies with **Terraform** and **AWS CDK**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms leveraging **Python** along with strong foundational skills in event-driven architectures and compliance-driven development aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Adept in using advanced technologies to drive automation and real-time processing, ensuring high-quality and compliant solutions.
